id: scenario-value-scanner-young-adult-scenarios-educational-understanding value creation through care economy education
title: Understanding value creation through care economy education
description: Understanding value creation through care economy education
content:
Scenario: Understanding value creation through care economy education
    Given traditional economics education emphasizes market transactions
    And Aisha is learning care economy principles
    When the personal_agent teaches value concepts
    Then it should explain how care creates value
    And it should teach that invisible work is valuable
    And it should explain care token economics
    And it should help her understand reciprocal care systems
    And care economy literacy should provide alternative to market capitalism
    And foundational economic understanding should center care
